Uses of Interface
com.larkwoodlabs.channels.InputChannel

Packages that use InputChannel
com.larkwoodlabs.channels Provides interfaces and classes for sending, receiving and transforming messages within an application. 
com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp Provides interfaces and classes used to send and receive UDP datagrams. 
 

Uses of InputChannel in com.larkwoodlabs.channels
 

Classes in com.larkwoodlabs.channels that implement InputChannel
 class InputChannelAdapter<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType>
          Abstract base class for all message input channels that transform or filter messages received from an inner message channel.
 class InputChannelFilter<MessageType>
          An input channel adapter that uses a filter to determine which messages received from an inner input channel can be received from the adapter channel.
 class InputChannelPipe<MessageType>
          A message input channel that receives messages from any object that implements the MessageInput interface.
 class InputChannelTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType>
          An input channel adapter that transforms message objects received from another InputChannel into message objects of the same or different type.
 

Constructors in com.larkwoodlabs.channels with parameters of type InputChannel
ChannelPump(InputChannel<MessageType> inputChannel, OutputChannel<MessageType> outputChannel)
          Constructs a channel pump that connects the specified input and output channels.
InputChannelFilter(InputChannel<MessageType> innerChannel, MessageFilter<MessageType> filter)
          Constructs an input channel filter.
InputChannelTransform(InputChannel<InnerMessageType> innerChannel, MessageTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType> transform)
          Constructs an input channel that uses the specified transform object to transform messages produced by the specified inner input channel into the message produced by this channel.
 

Uses of InputChannel in com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp
 

Classes in com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp that implement InputChannel
 class UdpInputChannel
          An InputChannel that can be used to receive UdpDatagram instances from a UdpEndpoint.
